title: 36 of the Technological Universities Act 2018 (No. 3 of 2018) and the Further
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Technological Universities Act 2018
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Technological Universities Act 2018 

(Section 36) (Appointed Day) Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited technological university act 2018 (section 36) (appointed day) order 2020

title: 36 of the Technological Universities Act 2018 (No. 3 of 2018) and the Further
heading: 2. The 1st day of January 2021 is appointed to be the appointed day for
text_raw:
2. The 1st day of January 2021 is appointed to be the appointed day for 
the purpose of section 36 of the Technological Universities Act 2018 (No. 3 of 
2018) and this Order.
text_norm: 2 1st day january 2021 appointed appointed day purpose section 36 technological university act 2018 (no 3 2018) order

title: 36 of the Technological Universities Act 2018 (No. 3 of 2018) and the Further
heading: 3. On the appointed day referred to in Article 2 -
text_raw:
3. On the appointed day referred to in Article 2 - 

(a) 

the following applicant institutes shall stand dissolved: 
(i) Cork Institute of Technology; 
(ii) 

Institute of Technology, Tralee, 

and 

(b) 

the technological university known by the following name shall 
stand established: 

(i) 

(ii) 

in 
University, 
in 
Mumhan. 

the English 

language, Munster Technological 

the Irish 

language, Ollscoil Teicneolaíochta na 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 4th December, 2020.

SIMON HARRIS,
